## Source: ossf-package-analysis (fbb97c227c663215810abd8867643e6709416bf4e16526391cc0c740f9dce047)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'azureml-contrib-daskonbatch' @ 1.0.0 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
